name: 4fd35231-6ea4-549f-9046-5d311caa3abf
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Granada, Spain (20060101 - 20180101). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Granada, Spain (20060101 - 20180101)
